Module BrickBreaker
Package breakout.core.contracts

Interface CollisionInitiable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Collectible, Collectible, GuidedProjectile, LargePaddleCollectible, LifeCollectible, Orb, Projectile, StandardOrb
public interface CollisionInitiable
Used to mark an entity that is not constrained by limited movements and can initiate collision with other entities

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    collidesWith(Entity entity)
    Checks if the entity is colliding with another entity.

  • Method Details

    • collidesWith

      boolean collidesWith(Entity entity)
      Checks if the entity is colliding with another entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check collision with.
      Returns:
      True if the entity is colliding with the other entity, false otherwise.
